pages.text: Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu 'In Tuti`u Al-Ladhina Kafaru Yaruddukum `Ala 'A`qabikum Fatanqalibu Khasirina
Bali Allahu Mawlakum Wa Huwa Khayru An-Nasirina
Sanulqi Fi Qulubi Al-Ladhina Kafaru Ar-Ru`ba Bima 'Ashraku Billahi Ma Lam Yunazzil Bihi Sultanaan Wa Ma'wahumu An-Naru Wa Bi'sa Mathwa Az-Zalimina

Wa Laqad Sadaqakumu Allahu Wa`dahu 'Idh Tahussunahum Bi'idhnihi Hatta 'Idha Fashiltum Wa Tanaza`tum Fi Al-'Amri Wa `Asaytum Min Ba`di Ma 'Arakum Ma Tuhibbuna Minkum Man Yuridu Ad-Dunya Wa Minkum Man Yuridu Al-'Akhirata Thumma Sarafakum `Anhum Liyabtaliyakum Wa Laqad `Afa `Ankum Wa Allahu Dhu FaÄ‘lin `Ala Al-Mu'uminina
Idh Tus`iduna Wa La Talwuna `Ala 'Ahadin Wa Ar-Rasulu Yad`ukum Fi 'Ukhrakum Fa'athabakum Ghammaan Bighammin Likayla Tahzanu `Ala Ma Fatakum Wa La Ma 'Asabakum Wa Allahu Khabirun Bima Ta`maluna
